10#include "rtc_base/task_queue.h"
11
12#include "api/task_queue/task_queue_base.h"
13
14namespace rtc {
15
16TaskQueue::TaskQueue(
17 std::unique_ptr<webrtc::TaskQueueBase, webrtc::TaskQueueDeleter> task_queue)
18 : impl_(task_queue.release()) {}
19
20TaskQueue::~TaskQueue() {
21 // There might running task that tries to rescheduler itself to the TaskQueue
22 // and not yet aware TaskQueue destructor is called.
23 // Calling back to TaskQueue::PostTask need impl_ pointer still be valid, so
24 // do not invalidate impl_ pointer until Delete returns.
25 impl_->Delete();
26}
27
28bool TaskQueue::IsCurrent() const {
29 return impl_->IsCurrent();
30}
31
32void TaskQueue::PostTask(std::unique_ptr<webrtc::QueuedTask> task) {
33 return impl_->PostTask(std::move(task));
34}
35
36void TaskQueue::PostDelayedTask(std::unique_ptr<webrtc::QueuedTask> task,
37 uint32_t milliseconds) {
38 return impl_->PostDelayedTask(std::move(task), milliseconds);
39}
40
41} // namespace rtc
42
